html: Light. Prosperity, (Calmet) or Saviour. (Haydock) — Matthew iv. 2., and John i. 8. (Calmet) — Health. Aquila, "the scar of thy wound shall soon be covered." (St. Jerome) — Up. He shall close the rear, like the angel in the cloud, Exodus xiii. 21., and xiv. 19. He will grant thee rest from bondage in the grave and in heaven. (Calmet)
